SELECT REVIEW_BOARD_CODE , REVIEW_BOARD_TITLE , REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT , REVIEW_BOARD_WRITER , REVIEW_BOARD_REG_DATE , REVIEW_BOARD_RECOMMEND_CNT , REVIEW_BOARD_READ_CNT , REVIEW_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , IS_MAIN , ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT REVIEW_BOARD_CODE , REVIEW_BOARD_TITLE , REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT , REVIEW_BOARD_WRITER , REVIEW_BOARD_REG_DATE , REVIEW_BOARD_RECOMMEND_CNT , REVIEW_BOARD_READ_CNT , REVIEW_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , IS_MAIN , ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT R.REVIEW_BOARD_CODE , REVIEW_BOARD_TITLE , REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT , REVIEW_BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_BOARD_REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REVIEW_BOARD_REG_DATE , REVIEW_BOARD_RECOMMEND_CNT , REVIEW_BOARD_READ_CNT , REVIEW_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , IS_MAIN FROM REVIEW_BOARD R, REVIEW_IMG I WHERE IS_MAIN = 'Y' AND R.REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = I.REVIEW_BOARD_CODE
AND ${searchKeyword} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
ORDER BY
REVIEW_BOARD_READ_CNT DESC, REVIEW_BOARD_RECOMMEND_CNT DESC,
REVIEW_BOARD_CODE DESC ) ) WHERE ROW_NUM >= #{startNum} AND ROW_NUM <= #{endNum}

SELECT B.REVIEW_BOARD_CODE , REVIEW_BOARD_TITLE , REVIEW_BOARD_CONTENT , REVIEW_BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_BOARD_REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REVIEW_BOARD_REG_DATE , REVIEW_BOARD_RECOMMEND_CNT , REVIEW_BOARD_READ_CNT , REVIEW_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , IS_MAIN FROM REVIEW_BOARD B, REVIEW_IMG I WHERE B.REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = I.REVIEW_BOARD_CODE AND B.REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = #{reviewBoardCode}

SELECT REVIEW_REPLY_CODE , MEMBER_ID , REVIEW_REPLY_WRITER , REVIEW_REPLY_REG_DATE , REVIEW_REPLY_CONTENT , REVIEW_BOARD_CODE , ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT REVIEW_REPLY_CODE , MEMBER_ID , REVIEW_REPLY_WRITER , REVIEW_REPLY_REG_DATE , REVIEW_REPLY_CONTENT , REVIEW_BOARD_CODE , ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT REVIEW_REPLY_CODE , MEMBER_ID , REVIEW_REPLY_WRITER , REVIEW_REPLY_REG_DATE , REVIEW_REPLY_CONTENT , REVIEW_BOARD_CODE FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = #{reviewBoardCode} ORDER BY REVIEW_REPLY_CODE DESC ) ) WHERE ROW_NUM >= #{startNum} AND ROW_NUM <= #{endNum}

SELECT REVIEW_REPLY_CODE , REVIEW_REPLY_WRITER , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_REPLY_REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REVIEW_REPLY_REG_DATE , REVIEW_REPLY_CONTENT , REVIEW_BOARD_CODE FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE REVIEW_REPLY_CODE = #{reviewReplyCode}

SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_BOARD_CODE) FROM REVIEW_BOARD
WHERE ${searchKeyword} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_REPLY_CODE) FROM REVIEW_REPLY
WHERE ${searchKeyword} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
SELECT REVIEW_RECOMMEND_CODE , MEMBER_ID , REVIEW_BOARD_CODE , IS_RECOMMEND FROM REVIEW_RECOMMEND WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND REVIEW_BOARD_CODE = #{reviewBoardCode}
